mainSubtitle.id: Jelajahi, bandingkan, dan temukan layanan Huawei Cloud yang tepat untuk kebutuhan Anda melalui panduan visual yang terkurasi.
mainSubtitle.en: Explore, compare, and find the right Huawei Cloud services for your needs through curated visual guides.

huaweiComputeDesc.id: Layanan komputasi dari Elastic Cloud Server (ECS) hingga Bare Metal Server (BMS).
huaweiComputeDesc.en: Compute services from Elastic Cloud Server (ECS) to Bare Metal Server (BMS).

huaweiStorageDesc.id: Temukan solusi dari Object Storage (OBS), Block Storage (EVS), hingga File Storage (SFS).
huaweiStorageDesc.en: Find solutions from Object Storage (OBS), Block Storage (EVS), to File Storage (SFS).

huaweiDatabaseDesc.id: Jelajahi database relasional seperti RDS dan NoSQL seperti GaussDB untuk semua kebutuhan aplikasi Anda.
huaweiDatabaseDesc.en: Explore relational databases like RDS and NoSQL like GaussDB for all your application needs.

huaweiAimlDesc.id: Pahami tumpukan layanan AI, dari platform ModelArts hingga API siap pakai seperti OCR dan Image Recognition.
huaweiAimlDesc.en: Understand the AI stack, from the ModelArts platform to ready-to-use APIs like OCR and Image Recognition.

huaweiNetworkingDesc.id: Sediakan jaringan global yang aman dan andal dengan VPC, ELB, dan Direct Connect.
huaweiNetworkingDesc.en: Provide secure and reliable global networking with VPC, ELB, and Direct Connect.

huaweiSecurityDesc.id: Lindungi data dan aplikasi Anda dengan layanan keamanan terintegrasi seperti Anti-DDoS dan WAF.
huaweiSecurityDesc.en: Protect your data and applications with integrated security services like Anti-DDoS and WAF.

roadmapHuaweiQ3List.id:
• Panduan Jaringan Huawei: Cakupan VPC, ELB, dan Direct Connect.
  • Mode Perbandingan Layanan: Bandingkan 2-3 layanan secara berdampingan.
  • Peningkatan UI/UX berdasarkan masukan pengguna.
roadmapHuaweiQ3List.en:
• Huawei Networking Guide: Covering VPC, ELB, and Direct Connect.
  • Service Comparison Mode: Compare 2‚Äì3 services side-by-side.
  • UI/UX improvements based on user feedback.

roadmapHuaweiQ4Desc.id: Ekspansi ke Layanan Data dan AI Huawei
roadmapHuaweiQ4Desc.en: Expansion into Huawei's Data and AI Services

roadmapHuaweiQ4List.id:
• Rilis panduan ModelArts.
  • Tutorial mendalam tentang Data Warehouse Service (DWS).
roadmapHuaweiQ4List.en:
• Release of the ModelArts guide.
  • In-depth tutorials for Data Warehouse Service (DWS).
